name: Gate301
tagline: Hosted redirect from TLD.xyz to www.TLD.xyz
body:
# Gate301.io

***

## About
Gate301.io is a hosted HTTP301 redirect which simply adds "www." to the original address.

***

## Usage

1. In your zone file, assign *54.225.203.217* as an IP for your TLD record.

```
@  IN  A  54.225.203.217
```

2. Subscribe to a newsletter - this way I'll be able to let you know if any technical changes occur.


***

## Usage Examples
You would use Gate301.io if you own *example.org* domain, and you want the visitors of http://example.com/ to be redirected to http://www.example.com/

***

## FAQ

### Does it work with SSL?
NO, it doesn't

### How stable is it?
I might turn down the server for a couple minutes a month for maintenance, so please don't use Gate31.io for critical production apps.

## How else can I set up a redirect to WWW for my domain?
* If your domain is hosted at GoDaddy, take a look at http://support.godaddy.com/help/article/5120/redirect-urls-with-your-hosting-account
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
